ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Amir Kashipahza is a resident of Salt Lake City, UT, US. He has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 8 years. During his last employment he was working as a System Administrator/Installation at Goldman Sachs. Amir has extensive knowledge of Sun Solaris, Veritas Volume Manager, AIX UNIX, UNIX, Veritas NetBackup, Veritas Cluster, Linux, SUN Hardware > Sun Enterprise Servers, Linux Red Hat, shell scripting, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, Veritas File System, Veritas, VMware, Sybase, RAID, Oracle, Network File System, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, IBM WebSphere, FTP, Apache WEB Server, Web Services, Veritas Clusters, Secure Shell, SNMP, SAS Statistical Package, Oracle Real Application Clusters, NetApp Filers, LSI StoreAge > StoreAge SVM, IP, IBM RS6000 Hardware, High Availability, Data Centre. So far Amir has not gained any managerial experience.
